synopsis.text:
Nayuta, Rin, Mafuyu, and Fubuki are four young women with big dreams and even bigger ambitions. Their shared goal? To conquer the world of traditional Japanese stand-up comedy, known as manzai. Despite the challenges and setbacks they face, these four friends remain determined to make their mark in the industry.

Working part-time jobs and performing in small venues in Shibuya, they tirelessly hone their skills and gain experience. But their ultimate dream is to perform live at the prestigious Namba Grand Kagetsu theater.

To achieve their goal, they experiment with different performance styles and enter competitions, always striving to improve and grow as artists. Through it all, they remain united by their belief that laughter brings happiness, and that by making others happy, they too will find fulfillment.

Will these four friends be able to overcome the obstacles in their path and achieve their dream of becoming professional comedians? Join them on their journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
